desc: The No Spill Spout is simply the best solution to spills that helps pour liquid out of 1-Gallon Plastic Refill Jugs with-out the hassle messy spills and clean up. The clever combination of a spout and funnel that provides the best ‘Glug-Free’ and "Spill-Free" pouring in a controlled steady stream. Patented. Made In USA

layout.text:
The Spill Free Hassle Free Glug Glug Free Pouring Funnel Easily Fits On 185+ Brands of 1-Gallon Refill Jugs... 100% Money Back Guarantee.
No Spill Refill... Refill No Spill...
